TextBlock.Text: SAMATU: I'm sure you are all aware of why I've gathered you here, but I'm going to say it again anyway: we have not received any communication from Home System in a very long time.
OLI: Do we have any idea what's going on with them?
SAMATU: The last message they sent only mentioned that they were in a "tough spot."
MAKALU: We got some worrying hints about the political and financial situation back home in the final year of the project, maybe something happened?
TEKANA: It would have to be, the attack didn't sever all communication between the Home World and the colonies.
SILANA: Perhaps the cost of this project bankrupted the Home World?
KASILI: We never should have built this terrible weapon...
MAKALU: No Silana, they wouldn't just stop all communication if that happened, they'd want us to come home, right?
KATA: This is making me sick...
NELA: The enemy must have attacked again, with more firepower this time!
MILA: There's no way they could develop that much firepower with their limited resources in these few years.
SAMATU: Well, whatever happened to them, we may have to just wait it out, for as long as it may take.
SAMATU: We have no interstellar-capable ships, and no materials with which to build them. We have no choice but to use the cryopods in the Core.
NELA: Those cryopods can't keep us alive forever! What if we're never found?
OLI: I don't want to think about that...
MAKALU: I don't think we have any other choice.
